metadata.title: CVE-2022-38475 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have written a value to the first element in azero-length JavaScript array. Although the array was zero-length, the valuewas not written to an invalid memory address. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 104.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
